attributes.action: Extend the Manchester Metro System as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
New stations have been built but no track laid down. No one seems to know what is happening anymore!
What is needed now is action to greatly expand the service to Leigh, Swinton, Wigan, Traford Centre and other areas. If we are going to have to pay road tolls we are going to need another transport system ready and waiting.
